channel.title: How to get free $200 in two steps
channel.description:
Now this is a really basic way to get $200 it's a one time thing and it's limited to only several people (30 I think)
1. Go to http://www.todaysdate.com/ and check the date. 2. Now go to http://tinyurl.com/4poyc6x and this will inform you to how you should do it.

item.title: How to get free $200 in two steps
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s blatantly obvious tricks like this that almost make me lose hope in April Fools.

Read full topic

item.title: How to get free $200 in two steps
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:9, topic:512912”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=631157.msg4274077#msg4274077 date=1364796785]
Wow you stole the same rick roll link from lins topic weak m8
[/quote]
It’s okay, the real joke was to get him to post this, but we all knew it was already a rick roll so no one would have clicked it making his topic seem all kinds of stupid. April fools Mikeyzzz[/quote]There still a joke in this. That keeps my goat afloat.
